title: Mobile operators : carrier market shares in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 9 number of Mobile Carriers.
The Market share is highest at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and lowest at Mobile Carrier Talk Talk.
The Market share of Mobile Carrier Talk Talk is 28.0% smaller than the maximum value at BT (including EE).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 9 number of Mobile Carriers.
Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) has the highest Market share and Talk Talk has the lowest Market share.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 9 number of Mobile Carriers.
The Market share is highest at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and lowest at Mobile Carrier Talk Talk.
The Market share of Mobile Carrier Talk Talk is 28.0% smaller than the maximum value at BT (including EE).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Mobile Carrier in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 28.0 is found at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and the minimum is found at Talk Talk where Market share is 1.0.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Mobile Carrier is 27.0.
Market share at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) is 28.0 , second place is  at 28.0, and thirdly is Vodafone at 21.0.
Mobile Carrier Talk Talk, iD Mobile, and Sky have the same Market share.
The Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) tends to be 2.52 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Mobile Carriers, we get total 100.0.
